articles.description: Destiny 2 hit a peak with Lightfall but it was unable to capitalize on all that attention.
articles.content:
Destiny 2
Bungie
You can say that its been six years, so fans are simply burning out on Destiny 2 as they leave the game or stay but complain uh, a whole lot about it (myself included, of course).… [+3083 chars]
